import React from 'react' import {useContext} from 'react' import AppContext from '../context' const Drawer = ({onOpenedCart, cartItems=[], onDeleteItem}) => { const totalPrice = cartItems.reduce((sum, item) =>sum + item.price,0) console.log(totalPrice) return (

Cart

{ cartItems.length>0?
{cartItems && cartItems.map((item, index)=>(

{item.description}

Price:{item.price}$
onDeleteItem(item.id)} className="removeBtn" width={22} height={22} src="image/icons8-remove-50.png">
))}
  • Total:
    {totalPrice}
  • TAX 10%:
    {totalPrice*0.05}$
:

Your cart is empty, please return to store to order T-shirt

}
) } export default Drawer
